info.title: Dime.Scheduler (on-prem)
info.description: Dime.Scheduler is a resource and project planning solution that extends the capabilities of ERP, CRM and other business systems with powerful graphical scheduling tools.

post.summary: Add, update or remove a category
post.description: Add, update or remove a category, which is the visual indicator that renders the background of the appointment.

parameters.name: ds-append
parameters.description: True to create or update the record, false to remove.

post.summary: Add, update or remove a time marker
post.description: Add, update or remove a time marker, which is the visual indicator that renders the underscore of the appointment.

parameters.name: ds-append
parameters.description: True to create or update the record, false to remove.

parameters.name: timeMarker
parameters.description: JSON request body containing the contents of the requested entity to be imported.

post.summary: Add, update or remove a pin
post.description: Add, update or remove a pin, which is the visual indicator that renders the colors of the markers on the map.

parameters.name: ds-append
parameters.description: True to create or update the record, false to remove.

parameters.name: pin
parameters.description: JSON request body containing the contents of the requested entity to be imported.
